name: Strange Tales - Midnight Candy Boy
description:
Drive the story of this interactive webtoon (web comic)  through your choices! 

Strange Tales - Midnight Candy Boy is an interactive webtoon game that lets you decide how the story will unfold while reading the webtoon. You play as Jane who is a student living in a college dormitory. Depending on your choices made, you will get different endings. 

Enjoy the enhanced webtoon reading experience with sounds, music, animation and choices embedded within it.

This game will be updated with new episodes over time, just like how a normal webtoon update its episodes. It features a save functionality to save your choices made in older episodes so you won't have replay them again when new episodes are released. Just download and continue play!

Episodes:

Episode 1 - 4/5/2020 

Episode 2 - coming soon !

Sources used:

Music: Ghost Hunt anime OST

Voices: https://www.voicery.com/
